title: Acts of Violence
description: When his fiancee is kidnapped by human traffickers, Roman and his ex-military brothers set out to track her down and save her before it is too late. Along the way, Roman teams up with Avery, a cop investigating human trafficking and fighting the corrupt bureaucracy that has harmful intentions.

reviews.text: I loved the movie. The story was very interesting and I am a big fan of Bruce Willis and Cole Hauser. It does a good job of shining some light on one of humanity's darkest areas. The acting was good and overall a very enjoyable experience. We could've done without the strip club scene but thats what a fast forward button is for.
Not a solid Action Thriller but entertaining enough. Hauser performs well, in other movies he did not convince me that much, Ashmore beyond handsomeness and very emotive sequences. 6'5/10

With a polished production quaity, I’m not sure the message would have been as good.The messsge was very strong, and this movie is about regular folks.  I wish most of us, in America would stand up to what is wrong, in several ways.This movie is a odern version of “Saving Private Ryan.”It reminds me of the best Christian film.
Another **** action film starring Bruce Willis. It’s getting hard to differentiate them.
If you're in the mood for a good laugh, give this slopfest a try. My favorite character is Max...see if you agree.
